Event.Name: House10InAries
Event.ConditionDescription: When the 10th House from the Ascendant sign falls on the sign of Aries
Event.Description: it can be said the person concerned may have a profession or job which is generally regarded as his livelihood in the line somehow associated with - 1) goiter 2) shop farming 3) cattle shed 4) Forestry 5) Mining 6) Firefighting etc. 7) Washing 8) Cinema 9) Writing, Publishing 10) Astrology 11) Boxing or Wrestling 12) Fighter.

Event.Name: House10InTaurus
Event.ConditionDescription: When the 10th House falls in the sign of Taurus
Event.Description: the person concerned may have a living by associating himself with — 1) Agriculture 2) Cattle sheds 3) Circus 4)Wood cutting 5) Engineering 6) Industry 7) Paper 8) Cloth & garments 9) Police 10) Security

Event.Name: House10InGemini
Event.ConditionDescription: When the 10th House falls in the sign of Gemini
Event.Description: the person concerned may have a living by associating himself with— 1) Carpentry 2) Gambling House 3) Cinema 4) Musical connection 5) Theatre Hall 6) Granaries 7) Aero planes 8) Libraries 9) Banking 10) Anthology 11) Publishing 12) Stone-Houses 13) Excise 14) Narcotic 15) Revenue 16) Teaching

Event.Name: House10InCancer
Event.ConditionDescription: When the 10th House falls in the sign of Cancer
Event.Description: the native may have livelihood by associating himself with the works of — 1) Fishing 2) Fiery Ghats 3) River boater 4) Wet cultivation 5) Water-work 6) Jeweler 7) Foods 8) Earthen work 9) Management of Marshy lands 10) Bravery 11) Wine shop 12) Gems 13) Steed 14) Hotel 15) Teacher

Event.Name: House10InLeo
Event.ConditionDescription: When the 10th House falls in the sign of Leo
Event.Description: the person concerned may have living by associating himself with the work of—1) Missionary 2) Government Instrumentation 3) Chemical laboratory 4) Jute Motes 5) Fire Brigade 6) Astrology 7) Explosive factories 8) Circus 9) Forts 10) Palaces 11) Embassy 12) Army

Event.Name: House10InVirgo
Event.ConditionDescription: When the 10th House falls in the sign of Virgo
Event.Description: the native may have living by associating himself with any— 1) Science Institution 2) Art works 3) Banking 4) Peons 5) Big Industry 6) Medicine Manufacturing 7) Drug -store 8)Nursery 9) Pottery 10) Writings 11) Education 12) Coaching 13) Industry 14) Manufacturing

Event.Name: House10InLibra
Event.ConditionDescription: When the 10th House falls in the sign of Libra
Event.Description: the native may get his living by associating himself with the work of— 1) An organization managing a commercial center or trading place 2) An organization running any gambling center 3) A contract of making or repairing roads or a municipality 4) A telephone exchange office 5) Astrology 6) Education 7) Railway 8) Typing , Printing and copying 9) Supplier of clothes and stationery goods

Event.Name: House10InCancer
Event.ConditionDescription: When the 10th House falls in the sign of Cancer
Event.Description: the native may have livelihood by associating himself with the works of — 1) Fishing 2) Fiery Ghats 3) River boater 4) Wet cultivation 5) Water-work 6) Jeweler 7) Foods 8) Earthen work 9) Management of Marshy lands 10) Bravery 11) Wine shop 12) Gems 13) Steed 14) Hotel 15) Teacher

Event.Name: House10InLeo
Event.ConditionDescription: When the 10th House falls in the sign of Leo
Event.Description: the person concerned may have living by associating himself with the work of—1) Missionary 2) Government Instrumentation 3) Chemical laboratory 4) Jute Motes 5) Fire Brigade 6) Astrology 7) Explosive factories 8) Circus 9) Forts 10) Palaces 11) Embassy 12) Army

Event.Name: House10InVirgo
Event.ConditionDescription: When the 10th House falls in the sign of Virgo
Event.Description: the native may have living by associating himself with any— 1) Science Institution 2) Art works 3) Banking 4) Peons 5) Big Industry 6) Medicine Manufacturing 7) Drug -store 8)Nursery 9) Pottery 10) Writings 11) Education 12) Coaching 13) Industry 14) Manufacturing

Event.Name: House10InLibra
Event.ConditionDescription: When the 10th House falls in the sign of Libra
Event.Description: the native may get his living by associating himself with the work of— 1) An organization managing a commercial center or trading place 2) An organization running any gambling center 3) A contract of making or repairing roads or a municipality 4) A telephone exchange office 5) Astrology 6) Education 7) Railway 8) Typing , Printing and copying 9) Supplier of clothes and stationery goods

Event.Name: House10InScorpio
Event.ConditionDescription: When the 10th House falls in the sign of Scorpio
Event.Description: the native may for his living associate himself with any— 1) Any organization running eating places. 2) Cultivation, orchard 3) Maintenance of any Vineyard 4) Resorts with swimming pool 5) Baking 6) Excise 7) Science 8) Education 9) Politics 10) Hospital 11) Prison 12) Mint

Event.Name: House10InSagittarius
Event.ConditionDescription: When the 10th House falls in the sign of Sagittarius
Event.Description: the native may get himself associated for his living with any— 1) Organization supplying material to army barrack, battlefields. 2) Trading or supplying material to defence department 3) organization running depots of communication. 4) Military stores 5) Playground 6) Educational Institution and 7) Ministry 8) A religious Institution 9) Scientist and Philosopher 10) Engineering.

Event.Name: House10InCapricorn
Event.ConditionDescription: In the case where 10th House falls in Capricorn
Event.Description: the native may get any post or job associated with— 1) Water management 2) Irrigation 3) Forestry 4) Oil refinery 5) Oil Petrol or Industry 6) Works in Church or Church yard 7) Temples or Math’s Institutions 8) Arsenals 9) Fishery 10) Woodcutting 11) Marshy land management 12) Literature

Event.Name: House10InAquarius
Event.ConditionDescription: In case the 10th House falls in the sign of Aquarius
Event.Description: the native may get a living by associating himself with— 1) Wine shop 2) Brewing 3) Toddy shop 4) Vulgar folks 5) Gambling6)Thriving 7) Machinery 8) Aero plane & Mining 9) Orchard 10) Vine yards.

Event.Name: House10InPisces
Event.ConditionDescription: In case the 10th House falls in the sign of Pisces
Event.Description: the native may associate himself for a living with— 1) Religions Institution 2) Any work in a pious place. 3) Water-management 4) Irrigation 5) Shipping 6) Fishery 7) Oil interest 8) Food 9) Publishing 10) Astrology 11) Medicine 14) Priest 15) Education 16) Electronics

Event.Name: DhumaInHouse1
Event.Description: Native will be valiant, endowed with beautiful eyes, stupefied in disposition, unkind, wicked and highly short tempered.

Event.Name: DhumaInHouse2
Event.Description: One will be sickly, wealth, devoid of a limb, incur humiliation at a royal level, dull-witted and a eunuch.

Event.Name: DhumaInHouse3
Event.Description: Intelligent, bold, delighted, eloquent and endowed with men and wealth.

Event.Name: DhumaInHouse4
Event.Description: Grieved because losing one’s partner, yet learned in all shastras.

Event.Name: DhumaInHouse5
Event.Description: Limited progeny, devoid of wealth, be great, yet devoid of friends and Mantras.

Event.Name: DhumaInHouse6
Event.Description: Strong, able to conquer enemies, brilliant, famous and free from diseases.

Event.Name: DhumaInHouse7
Event.Description: Penniless, ever sensuous, skilled in adultery, never able to shine.

Event.Name: DhumaInHouse8
Event.Description: Enthusiastic but without real courage, truthful, disagreeable, hard hearted and selfish.

Event.Name: DhumaInHouse9
Event.Description: Endowed with sons and fortunes, rich, honorable, kind, religious and well-disposed to one’s guides, relatives and culture.

Event.Name: DhumaInHouse10
Event.Description: Endowed with sons and fortunes, delighted, intelligent, happy and truthful.

Event.Name: DhumaInHouse11
Event.Description: Wealth, grains, gold, beautiful, knowledge of the arts, modesty and a skillful singer.

Event.Name: DhumaInHouse12
Event.Description: Lacking morality, indulging in sin, interested in adultery, addicted to vices, unkind and crafty.

Event.Name: VyatipaataInHouse1
Event.Description: Troubled by miseries, cruel, destructive, foolish and ill-disposed to his relatives.

Event.Name: VyatipaataInHouse2
Event.Description: Morally crooked, bilious, enjoying pleasures, unkind, ungrateful, wicked and sinful.

Event.Name: VyatipaataInHouse3
Event.Description: Firm in disposition, a warrior, liberal, rich, dear to a king and head of an army.

Event.Name: VyatipaataInHouse4
Event.Description: Endowed with relatives but not progeny or fortunes.

Event.Name: VyatipaataInHouse5
Event.Description: Poor yet charming in appearance, imbalances of phlegm, bile and wind, hard-hearted and shameless.

Event.Name: VyatipaataInHouse6
Event.Description: Destroyer of his enemies, physically mighty and skilled in all kinds of weapons and in arts, and be peaceful in disposition.

Event.Name: VyatipaataInHouse7
Event.Description: Bereft of wealth, wife and progeny, subduer of females, miserable, sensuous, shameless, and friendly to others.

Event.Name: VyatipaataInHouse8
Event.Description: Deformed eyes, ugly, unfortunate, spiteful to Brahmins and troubled by disorders of blood.

Event.Name: VyatipaataInHouse9
Event.Description: Many kinds of businesses and friends, very learned, well-disposed to his wife and eloquent.

Event.Name: VyatipaataInHouse10
Event.Description: rich, religious, peaceful, skillful in religious acts, very learned and far sighted.

Event.Name: VyatipaataInHouse11
Event.Description: Extremely opulent, honorable, truthful, firm in policy, and endowed with many horses and having an interest in singing.

Event.Name: VyatipaataInHouse12
Event.Description: Given to anger, associated with many activities, disabled, not religious and hateful towards relatives.

Event.Name: PariveshaInHouse1
Event.Description: Learned, truthful, peaceful, rich, endowed with sons, pure, charitable and dear to elders.

Event.Name: PariveshaInHouse2
Event.Description: Wealthy, charming, enjoyer of pleasures, happy, religious and a lord.

Event.Name: PariveshaInHouse3
Event.Description: Fond of his wife, charming, pious, well-disposed to his men, be a servant and respectful to elders.

Event.Name: PariveshaInHouse4
Event.Description: Wonderstruck, helpful to enemies as well, kind, endowed with everything and skillful in singing.

Event.Name: PariveshaInHouse5
Event.Description: Affluent, virtuous, splendorous, affectionate, religious and dear to his wife.

Event.Name: PariveshaInHouse6
Event.Description: Scholarship; kind Famous, wealthy, endowed with sons and pleasures, helpful to all and will conquer his enemies.

Event.Name: PariveshaInHouse7
Event.Description: Limited number of children, devoid of happiness, be of mediocre intelligence, very hard-hearted, sickly wife.

Event.Name: PariveshaInHouse8
Event.Description: Spiritually disposed, peaceful, strong bodied, firm in decision, religious and gentle.

Event.Name: PariveshaInHouse9
Event.Description: Having progeny, happy, brilliant, affluent, devoid of excessive passion, honorable and happy with very little.

Event.Name: PariveshaInHouse10
Event.Description: Versed in the arts, enjoy pleasures, strong bodied, learned in all shastras.

Event.Name: PariveshaInHouse11
Event.Description: Enjoy pleasures through women, virtuous, intelligent, dear to his people and suffer disorders of digestive fire.

Event.Name: PariveshaInHouse12
Event.Description: Spendthrift, miserable, firm and will dishonor relatives.

Event.Name: IndrachaapaInHouse1
Event.Description: Wealth, grains, gold, grateful, agreeable and devoid of all afflictions.

Event.Name: IndrachaapaInHouse2
Event.Description: Affable speaker, very rich, modest, learned, charming and religious.

Event.Name: IndrachaapaInHouse3
Event.Description: Helping nature; expertise in arts A miser, versed in many arts, indulge in thieving, devoid of some limb and unfriendly.

Event.Name: IndrachaapaInHouse4
Event.Description: Happy, endowed with quadrupeds, wealth and grains. Honored by the king and devoid of sickness.

Event.Name: IndrachaapaInHouse5
Event.Description: Splendorous, far-sighted, pious, affable, acquiring property in all undertakings.

Event.Name: IndrachaapaInHouse6
Event.Description: Destroyer of enemies, happy, affectionate, pure and will achieve plenty in all undertakings.

Event.Name: IndrachaapaInHouse7
Event.Description: Wealth, full of all virtues, learned in shastras, religious, and agreeable.

Event.Name: IndrachaapaInHouse8
Event.Description: Interested in doing other’s work, cruel, interested in adultery and defective limbed.

Event.Name: IndrachaapaInHouse9
Event.Description: Performing penance, take religious observations, highly learned, famous.

Event.Name: IndrachaapaInHouse10
Event.Description: Endowed with progeny, abundant wealth, cows, buffaloes, etc., Famous.

Event.Name: IndrachaapaInHouse11
Event.Description: Gainful, healthy, fiery, affectionate to his wife, and knowledge of mantras, weapons and missiles.

Event.Name: IndrachaapaInHouse12
Event.Description: Wicked, very honorable, evil in disposition, shameless, an adulterer and ever poor.

Event.Name: UpaketuInHouse1
Event.Description: Early death Skillful in all knowledge, happy, good speaker, agreeable and very affectionate.

Event.Name: UpaketuInHouse2
Event.Description: Ugly Good and affable speaker, splendorous, poet, scholar, honorable, modest, endowed with conveyances.

Event.Name: UpaketuInHouse3
Event.Description: Miserly, cruel, thin-bodied, poor and having severe diseases.

Event.Name: UpaketuInHouse4
Event.Description: Grief Charming, virtuous, gentle, interested in the Vedas and always happy.

Event.Name: UpaketuInHouse5
Event.Description: Loss of progeny Happy, enjoyer of pleasures, versed in the arts, skilled in expedients, intelligent, eloquent, and respectful to elders.

Event.Name: UpaketuInHouse6
Event.Description: Uneasiness Cause problems for maternal relatives, win over enemies, endowed with many relatives, valiant, splendorous, and skillful.

Event.Name: UpaketuInHouse7
Event.Description: Impotency Gambler, sensuous, enjoyer of pleasures and supporter of prostitutes.

Event.Name: UpaketuInHouse8
Event.Description: Death due to bad character Interested in base acts, sinful, shameless, blame others for lack of happiness, and will take another’s side.

Event.Name: UpaketuInHouse9
Event.Description: Opposes righteousness Wearer of religious badges, delighted, helpfully disposed, skilled in religious deeds.

Event.Name: UpaketuInHouse10
Event.Description: Fond of wandering Endowed with happiness and fortune, fond of females, charitable and a friend to Brahmins.

Event.Name: UpaketuInHouse11
Event.Description: Profits forever Acquisition of gains, religious, honorable, affluent, fortunate, valiant and skilled in sacrificial rites.

Event.Name: UpaketuInHouse12
Event.Description: Bad man Interested in sinful acts, valiant, untrustworthy, unkind, adulterer and short-tempered.

Event.Name: YamaghantakaInHouse1
Event.Description: Religious, full of learning, honest, peaceful, wealthy, charitable and with progeny.

Event.Name: YamaghantakaInHouse2
Event.Description: Wealthy, pleasant disposition, happy, spiritually inclined, dear to one’s traditions.

Event.Name: YamaghantakaInHouse3
Event.Description: Travels often, respectful to one’s peers, pious, charming, fond of one’s spouses.

Event.Name: YamaghantakaInHouse4
Event.Description: Quiet, peaceful heart, helpful to all in need, beautiful lands.

Event.Name: YamaghantakaInHouse5
Event.Description: Full of wonder, intelligent, affectionate, dear to his religion, full of virtue, abundant resources, lord of mantras.

Event.Name: YamaghantakaInHouse6
Event.Description: Diseases of excess, too trusting, difficulties with wealth, giver of loans.

Event.Name: YamaghantakaInHouse7
Event.Description: Unhappy, wasteful with resources, losses to spouse, problems with progeny and legacy.

Event.Name: YamaghantakaInHouse8
Event.Description: Deep intuition, astrologer, peaceful, strong bodied and long lived, gentle, inheritance.

Event.Name: YamaghantakaInHouse9
Event.Description: Having progeny, happy, valuable to one’s society, law giver, honorable, having much wealth, generous to those in need.

Event.Name: YamaghantakaInHouse10
Event.Description: Versed in religion and law, learned in all shastras, intelligent, artistic and happy.

Event.Name: YamaghantakaInHouse11
Event.Description: Enjoys relationships with others, dear to one’s people, phlegmatic diseases, well known and respected.

Event.Name: YamaghantakaInHouse12
Event.Description: Many expenses, miserable, dishonorable to relatives, belongs in a Math.

Event.Name: GulikaInHouse1
Event.Description: Afflicted by disease, lustful, sinful, crafty, wicked and miserable.

Event.Name: GulikaInHouse2
Event.Description: Ugly, miserable, mean, given to vices, shameless and poor.

Event.Name: GulikaInHouse3
Event.Description: Charming, a head of a village, fond of virtuous men, honored by royalty. Although one’s siblings may suffer.

Event.Name: GulikaInHouse4
Event.Description: Sickly, devoid of happiness, sinful and afflicted by windy and bilious excess.

Event.Name: GulikaInHouse5
Event.Description: Praiseworthy, poor, short-lived, spiteful, mean, a eunuch, subdued by wife and a heterodox.

Event.Name: GulikaInHouse6
Event.Description: Devoid of Enemies, strong and healthy, splendorous, liked by his wife, enthusiastic, friendly and helpful.

Event.Name: GulikaInHouse7
Event.Description: Subduer of women, sinful, adulterer, emaciated, devoid of friendship and will live off of others.

Event.Name: GulikaInHouse8
Event.Description: Troubled by hunger, cruel, miserable, short tempered, unkind and poor.

Event.Name: GulikaInHouse9
Event.Description: Experience many ordeals, emaciated, perform evil acts, be very unkind, sluggish, a liar.

Event.Name: GulikaInHouse10
Event.Description: Endowed with sons, happy, enjoyer of life, fond of worshipping gods, and will practice meditation and religion.

Event.Name: GulikaInHouse11
Event.Description: Enjoys women of class, a leader, helpful to relatives, short in stature, yet an emperor.

Event.Name: GulikaInHouse12
Event.Description: Sinful, base, unfortunate, indolent, joining to mean people.

Event.Name: MaandiInHouse1
Event.Description: Afflicted by disease, lustful, sinful, crafty, wicked and miserable.

Event.Name: MaandiInHouse2
Event.Description: Ugly, miserable, mean, given to vices, shameless and poor.

Event.Name: MaandiInHouse3
Event.Description: Charming, a head of a village, fond of virtuous men, honored by royalty. Although one’s siblings may suffer.

Event.Name: MaandiInHouse4
Event.Description: Sickly, devoid of happiness, sinful and afflicted by windy and bilious excess.

Event.Name: MaandiInHouse5
Event.Description: Praiseworthy, poor, short-lived, spiteful, mean, a eunuch, subdued by wife and a heterodox.

Event.Name: MaandiInHouse6
Event.Description: Devoid of Enemies, strong and healthy, splendorous, liked by his wife, enthusiastic, friendly and helpful.

Event.Name: MaandiInHouse7
Event.Description: Subduer of women, sinful, adulterer, emaciated, devoid of friendship and will live off of others.

Event.Name: MaandiInHouse8
Event.Description: Troubled by hunger, cruel, miserable, short tempered, unkind and poor.

Event.Name: MaandiInHouse9
Event.Description: Experience many ordeals, emaciated, perform evil acts, be very unkind, sluggish, a liar.

Event.Name: MaandiInHouse10
Event.Description: Endowed with sons, happy, enjoyer of life, fond of worshipping gods, and will practice meditation and religion.

Event.Name: MaandiInHouse11
Event.Description: Enjoys women of class, a leader, helpful to relatives, short in stature, yet an emperor.

Event.Name: MaandiInHouse12
Event.Description: Sinful, base, unfortunate, indolent, joining to mean people.

Event.Name: MaandiGulikaWithSun
Event.Description: Murderer of father

Event.Name: MaandiGulikaWithMoon
Event.Description: Brings grief to mother

Event.Name: MaandiGulikaWithMars
Event.Description: Loss of brothers

Event.Name: MaandiGulikaWithMars
Event.Description: Loss of brothers

Event.Name: MaandiGulikaWithMercury
Event.Description: Mad

Event.Name: MaandiGulikaWithJupiter
Event.Description: Unbeliever; ignoramous

Event.Name: MaandiGulikaWithVenus
Event.Description: Lives with low caste women

Event.Name: MaandiGulikaWithSaturn
Event.Description: Leper

Event.Name: MaandiGulikaWithRahu
Event.Description: Virus prone for diseases

Event.Name: MaandiGulikaWithKetu
Event.Description: Fire accident

Event.Name: MaandiGulikaInStrongSign
Event.Description: If the lord of the house occupied by Gulika be possessed of strength and be posited in a kendra, trikona, his own, exaltation or friendly house, the above results will be modified to the extent that such person will own conveyances, beautiful as Cupid, will be highly respected and widely renowned, and will be a man of power and authority.
